pages.text: The player can sleep, and naturally the maid can also sleep. At night or on a thunderstorm, the maid has the probability to look for the surrounding bed to sleep.

The sleeping maid will no longer be attacked by hostile creatures, and the maidâ€™s GUI cannot be opened at this time.$(br2)But remember, don't wake them up when the maids are asleep, or they will have a great decline in your favorability.
